parameter.name: LccChatBot-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: LccChatBot Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Server=tcp:freshers-training.database.windows.net,1433; Initial Catalog=Freshers-Training; Persist Security Info=False; User ID=trainingadmin; Password=training@123; MultipleActiveResultSets=False;Encrypt=True;TrustServerCertificate=False; Connection Timeout=30;
